column1: This virus is a scourge on humanity. I wish the President and First Lady a speedy recovery. We must take this situation seriously wear masks and social distance.

If you’re one of the hundreds of thousands of Americans who have received a test for COVID-19 antibodies the Food and Drug Administration has some bad news for you: you may have been the victim of a scam the FDA enabled. https://t.co/h2gqzX782v
COVID-19 affects the respiratory system. We need to protect our children's lungs. https://t.co/WHTpEbcAZB
Spreading misinformation about COVID-19 is dangerous and irresponsible.
I am giving back to my community due to Covid-19! All B— just kidding I haven't been hacked. Register to vote today at https://t.co/eETMM9uvjn
It was raining this morning but now it's quite lovely out. Both are good times to wear a mask and social distance! 😷
Happy 4th of July! Today we celebrate the freedom of our great nation. If you're celebrating today: wear a mask a social distance.

I was just on 60 Minutes this Sunday. I spoke up about how this President has botched the Coronavirus pandemic -- and how I’m preparing to take him head on. You can watch the full interview below...  https://t.co/hiTY9G8Vg4
Tune your TVs to CBS at 6pm central for my 60 Minutes interview on the current state of the #COVID antibody testing.   https://t.co/zG1yY4NfWd

I joined the Roe Conn show on  @WGNRadio to discuss how hundreds of dollars in coronavirus relief payments went to the deceased: “we have to conduct oversight on this and try to get to the bottom of how did this happen in the first place."  https://t.co/IebtA2bqf8

Congress will be pursuing answers on this because the American people deserve to know if their president sabotaged efforts to detect and contain COVID-19 because he didn’t like the results. The result he needs to focus on is the lives we can save.   https://t.co/Z1G1ciCzkZ

I led a letter signed by three other Congressional leaders addressed to the Federal Bureau of Prisons in order to better understand the health threat our correctional officers and the prisoners face in this #COVID19 epidemic.   https://t.co/8nNodXnbMz

I joined the Political Report to discuss the push for police reform on the federal level and I provided an update on where the next coronavirus relief package stands.  Listen to below for the full interview.   https://t.co/B9dFEnGrTK

I had the privilege to sit down with @wlsam890's Bill Cameron and discuss the protests occurring this past week and how these gatherings might effect our community during this #COVID19 pandemic.  https://t.co/trrAfaWWPr

Puff Bar is quickly becoming the new Juul because their ads are targeting young people. I wrote a letter to the FDA calling out Puff Bar for exploiting COVID-19 to sell their products. https://t.co/hCXmUDtQMB

Vaping is dangerous. Vaping is especially troublesome during this #COVID19 pandemic. I joined @ParentsvsVape to discuss how we can protect our youth from these predatory marketing employed by vaping companies.   https://t.co/HF7MvepA87

The desire to lure Americans back into traveling by making them feel like they are safe cannot outweigh the need to actually keep this country safe. #COVID19 #Allthistogether #StaySafe  https://t.co/DPjB8Jiri0

I discussed the latest #COVID19 stimulus bill the HEROES ACT the investigation into airline insurance claims and more on the @wgnkingjohn show. Listen below for the full interview.   https://t.co/r9nhKmlF8U

I am flying back to DC to vote on the #HeroesAct. This legislation will not only extend the expanded unemployment insurance but it will also provide needed assistance to State & Local Governments. This is needed to help those still harmed by #COVID19 https://t.co/vSa3PtiRbc

The Trump Administration did little to stop the inflow of the #Covid19 virus through our airports until Mid-March. Trump disregarded valuable opportunities to slow the spread and he failed at that. https://t.co/yHSTjfquJc

The FDA went too far completely abrogating regulatory responsibility regarding their oversight of the #COVID19 antibody tests. Now individuals are at risk with false positives and possibly putting themselves or those around them at risk. #Unacceptable! https://t.co/jPhTa9R4jX

I sat down with the @GregandDanWMBD show to talk about opening #Illinois back up in the wake of #COVID19. We also discussed what the Federal government must do to provide needed relief to suburban and smaller towns. Listen to the full interview below.   https://t.co/IyGilbyyvv

I joined @AliVelshi  to discuss the congressional investigation I am leading into the matter of false #COVID19 antibody tests. I am concerned people being fooled into thinking they have antibodies to COVID & potentially immunity when you actually do not. https://t.co/IVlObUyM4t

The FDA has allowed hundreds of unreliable tests into the market. The problem is many have high false positive rates. These false tests mislead people into thinking that they have the presence of #COVID19 antibodies when they actually don't https://t.co/jdh5YGG5gH
I have asked the FDA to reside their guidance on allowing fraudulent antibody tests. This administration cannot allow companies to mislead and endanger lives #COVID19 https://t.co/fcMpeMMUae

Congrats to Dr. Kaleem Malik on being named a #RedCross Disaster Services Hero! Dr. Malik & Humanity First along with many emergency medicine & trauma physicians are on the frontlines of natural disasters all over the world and fighting COVID today around the clock. Thank you!

Our healthcare workers first responders and essential workers are still putting their health at risk as this #coronavirus continues. We need to do our part by staying at home & if we need to go outside wear a mask #masks4chi #chicagowearsmasks #Masks4All https://t.co/jBQihDdbJb

The FDA has put our families at risk by allowing manufacturers to make fraudulent claims regarding the accuracy of their antibody tests that are on the market. My subcommittee is investigating these claims and will hold the FDA accountable #COVID19  https://t.co/YVCpPW1Eoh

My colleagues in the House passed part 3 of the #COVIDrelief package. This package will help struggling small businesses help address needed funding for our hospitals fighting COVID but most of all it will help move this nation forward towards recovery.

I am working hard to shed light on fraud during these stressful & challenging times. I am leading my subcommittee in the House Oversight to ensure we are not being taken advantage of and ensuring the stimulus $$ is used correctly. #COVIDrelief  https://t.co/CvOoe9cmAh
We need to make an example of Alex Jones and the Alex Jones of the world who seek to profit off of the coronavirus pandemic and this warning is a good first step...  https://t.co/4LxZh6aafO

The Federal state and local governments are working round the clock to ensure our communities have the testing we need to combat #COVID19. However misleading the public and providing potential false hope in this time of need is wrong.  https://t.co/uFUNQRKOhh

Communities throughout IL need our help. That is why I am leading the charge on securing additional funds to cover our local governments' unforeseen loss of revenue due to #COVID19.   https://t.co/x6PZYPsRJw

The current administration was unprepared to deal with #COVID19. This is unacceptable and I will continue to fight to rectify the situation and ensure our communities have the resources we need to flatten the curve. #StayHome   https://t.co/Ddawymsczu

My wife had to buy a welder's mask to protect herself. If we don’t provide the people fighting COVID-19 on the frontlines the resources they need they’ll no longer be able to treat patients they’ll become them.  https://t.co/XNBVkL11mV

Allowing e-cigs to remain on the market will harm users throughout the country and exacerbate the #COVID19  crisis in critical way. Reducing the # of vapers will not only help them in the fight against #COVID19 but the entire health system.  https://t.co/YJuXDWkoiC

We need massive public infrastructure investments now more than ever especially in our medical facilities. We have the opportunities to put hundreds of thousands of workers like @GoIUPAT members back to work to help our nation recover from #COVID19 https://t.co/wkSOpPHcCe

As you may know my colleagues and I passed the $2 trillion CARES Act to help families during this COVID crisis. I went on WGN to discuss how families and small businesses can benefit from this stimulus package. Take a listen...  https://t.co/M9kGXmqDWM

This Administration would be making a serious mistake not trying to be as transparent as it can be about its efforts when it comes to managing the COVID crisis. We have questions that need answers.   https://t.co/XmdL0mAKEj
Thank you for everyone on the front lines of this COVID crisis. We have your back during this tough time. We couldn’t do this without you! #AllInThisTogether #StrongerTogether #StayHome

We have to stay vigilant during these challenging times. We must not allow for companies take advantage of our need to find security during this crisis. My subcommittee will hold these companies that are offering a self-test for #COVID19 accountable. https://t.co/e8V6JIQiHh

The COVID-19 epidemic is a public health crisis but it is also an economic crisis for millions of Americans.  The Greater Chicago Food Depository which supplies nutritious food to food pantries throughout the region needs our financial help in a big way now.  (1/3)

Even during these strange and uncertain times this nation is built to be resilient. We will conquer these challenging times. I certainly wouldn't bet against America!   Check my interview with WGN on what is going on with COVID-19. https://t.co/UqG7LMaUYi
We are a day away from Election Day and COVID-19 has altered various polling places. Make sure you checked your polling place to make sure you know where to vote on March 17! https://t.co/16tJJg5IeV
Early this morning Congress passed the necessary COVID-19 relief bill. This will provide economic assistance to workers and businesses affected by the global pandemic.   https://t.co/1bSVCY9QaO

Cost should not be a barrier to getting test for the coronavirus. If people don't feel they can afford getting tested when they feel sick we are putting our community at risk. I will continue to hold this administration accountable in order to protect our families & friends.
